scripts.build:create-user: npm run shebang:create-user && npm run chmod:create-user
scripts.shebang:create-user: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > bin/create-user && cat create-user.js >> bin/create-user
scripts.build:read-users: npm run shebang:read-users && npm run chmod:read-users
scripts.shebang:read-users: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > bin/read-users && cat read-users.js >> bin/read-users
